        public void setOnActionCallback(<any> actionCallback)
        Sets the callback to call when a Tweet action (favorite, unfavorite) is performed.
        Parameters:
        actionCallback - called when a Tweet action is performed.

      • applyStyles

        protected void applyStyles()
        Apply the style attributes to the Tweet subviews. Must be called after view inflation and findSubviews.

      • setTweetActionsEnabled

        public void setTweetActionsEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable Tweet actions
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable Tweet actions, false otherwise.

      • getTweetId

        public long getTweetId()
        Returns:
        id of the Tweet of the TweetView.

      • setTweet

        public void setTweet(Tweet tweet)
        Set the Tweet to be displayed and update the subviews. For any data that is missing from the Tweet, invalidate the subview value (e.g. text views set to empty string) for view recycling. Cannot be called before inflation has completed.
        Parameters:
        tweet - Tweet data

      • getTweet

        public Tweet getTweet()
        Returns:
        the Tweet of the TweetView

        Returns:
